resources.string: Chofoza isixhumanisi ukuze unike amandla i-akhawunti yakho Lichess:
Uma ungazange ubhalise namaLayisense ungawunaka lo mlayezo ngokuphepha.
Sithole isicelo sokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi ye-akhawunti yakho.
Uma wenze lesi sicelo, chofoza kusixhumanisi esingezansi. Uma kungenjalo, ungayinaka le imeyili.
Ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uyakwazi ukufinyelela le imeyili, sicela uchofoze isixhumanisi esingezansi:

Udale i-akhawunti yakho ngempumelelo ku-https: //lichess.org.
Nali ikhasi lakho lephrofayili. Ungayenza ngezifiso.
Zithokozise, futhi kwangathi izingcezu zakho zingathola njalo indlela yazo eya enkosini yomphikisi wakho!
Le yi-imeyili yesevisi ehlobene nokusebenzisa kwakho.
